entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
